system.effect: The explosion flays the flesh from the target's face and bursts his eardrums with its force. The target is Stunned for [[1d10]] rounds and is permanently Deafened. Permanently reduce his Fellowship characteristic by 1d5.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Head (Severity 5)

The explosion flays the flesh from the target's face and bursts his eardrums with its force. The target is Stunned for [[1d10]] rounds and is permanently Deafened. Permanently reduce his Fellowship characteristic by 1d5.
